name: Shacetha
description:
Shacetha is a 2D top-down arena game, with an endless mode where a player can try to reach the highest level by defeating different challenging enemies and bosses on the way. Players are able to earn rewards as they defeat more enemy waves.

This game is still in its prototyping stage, the reward system is implemented but enemies, bosses and the endless arena is still in progress, any sounds, music, animations and sprites are likely to be changed. 

Any suggestions/feedback is greatly appreciated.

Assets:
Character & Enemy sprites - Lanea Zimmerman (https://opengameart.org/content/tiny-16-basic)
Items - https://blodyavenger.itch.io/rpg-items-retro-pack
Other - https://raou.itch.io/dungeon-tileset-top-down-rpg, https://raou.itch.io/topdown-rpg-pixel-art-tileset
